Lutsenko.name: Lutsenko Boris Ivanovich
Lutsenko.description: Belarusian theater director, People's Artist of Belarus (1995)

timeLine.text: Born September 16, 1937 in Maykop (Krasnodar Territory, RSFSR), in the family of an employee.
Studied at the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute
He taught at the Belarusian Academy of Arts.
Director at the Belarusian Theater named after Y. Kupala. Where he staged a number of memorable performances: “Rudobel Republic” (1968), “Memory of the Heart” (1970), etc.
The main director of the State Russian Drama Theater named after M. Gorky. He staged Macbeth (1974), The Three-Penny Opera (1976), The Last (1976), etc.
Director of the Kupalovsky Theater.
The main director of the Studio Theater of the film actor. The most successful performances: “Look who came”, “My Happiness, or Paper Phone” by Alexander Chervinsky (1983).
Artistic Director of the National Academic Drama Theater named after M. Gorky. In 2002, he staged a play based on the poem by Y. Kupala, “A Dream on the Barrow.
Director of the National Academic Drama Theater named after M. Gorky. He staged performances in theaters in Berlin, Vilnius, Geneva.

work.text: «My happiness, or Paper Phone» Alexander Chervinsky
Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf» Edward Albee
He made the film «The Scattered Nest»

Buinitskii.name: Buinitsky Ignat Terentevich
Buinitskii.description: Belarusian actor, director, theater figure, founder of the first professional national Belarusian theater

timeLine.text: Born on August 10, 1861 in the estate of Polivachi now Glubokoe district
After graduating from a four-year real school in Ulaclavka in the Warsaw province, Ignat Buinitskii graduated from the Riga Surveying School
He was married very young to the impoverished nobleman Franciszy Bzhazovsky, from this marriage he had four daughters.
His wife died and he married again - from the impoverished gentry from Mogilev, Maria Onoshko. Two more daughters were born from this marriage.
In his estate in Palivachi (near Prozoroki) he founded an amateur theater, where his relatives first participated.

In Vilnius on February 12, 1910, at the Buynichsky Theater, at a special invitation from the editorial board of Our Niva, he took part in a performance that went down in history under the name “The First Belarusian Party in Vilnius”.
The Buinitsky Theater toured Belarus, performed twice in St. Petersburg (1911, 1912), as well as in Warsaw (1913),
Due to material difficulties and pressure from the tsarist authorities, the troupe's activities were discontinued.
Buinitsky tried to create a new troupe, however, the 1st World War prevented the implementation of this plan.
During the First World War he went to the Western Front, was in military service in Molodechno

work.text: «By revision» и «Played the fools» Stamps Krapivnitsky
«Ham» и «On a winter evening» Элизы Ожешко

Pinigin.name: Nikolai Nikolaevich Pinigin
Pinigin.description: Belarusian director, Honored Artist of the Republic of Belarus

timeLine.text: Born in Izum in Ukraine
Graduated from the directing department of the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute
He worked as a director on Belarusian television
He worked at the Russian Drama Theater. M. Gorky (Minsk)
Director of the National Academic Theater named after Y. Kupala
Lecturer at the Department of “Actor and Director Skill” at the Belarusian Academy of Arts
The director was recognized as the “Person of the Year of Belarus” in the nomination “Scene”
Trained at Courant Fest in Paris at the invitation of the French Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Director of the Bolshoi Drama Theater. G. A. Tovstonogov (St. Petersburg)
Appointed Chief Director of the National Academic Theater named after Y. Kupala

work.text: The performance “The whims of Marianne” by A. Muse
Performance «Lying on long legs» E. de Filippo
The play “The Night Before Christmas”» M.V. Gogol

Mirovich.name: Evstigney Afinogenovich Mirovich
Mirovich.description: Belarusian playwright and theater director. One of the founders of the Belarusian theater art, the Belarusian Theater. Yankees Kupala.

timeLine.text: Born on August 10, 1878 in St. Petersburg in the family of a railroad worker, a native of the Northwest Territory.
After graduating from the theater courses in St. Petersburg. F. Volkova, began performing as an actor in St. Petersburg theaters
Full member of the St. Petersburg Union of Drama and Music Writers
He worked in theaters of Belarus
Artistic Director of the Belarusian Theater Y. Kupala (BDT-1).
Artistic Director of the Gomel Theater of Working Youth
Artistic director of the Belarusian theater of the young spectator named N. Krupskaya.
Artistic Director of the Belarusian Theater of Young Spectators named after N. Krupskaya.
Director of the Belarusian Theater. Y. Kupala (BDT-1).
Artistic director and head of the department of skill of the actor of the Belarusian Theater Institute.

work.text: Wrote and staged a play «Kastus Kalinovsky»
Wrote and staged a play «Governor's blacksmith»
Wrote and staged a play «omrade Bryzgalin's career»
Wrote and staged a play «Spindles are sealed»
Wrote and staged a play «On a spring night»

Dapkiunas.name: Vadzim Vyacheslavovich Dapkiunas
Dapkiunas.description: Belarusian theater figure and organizer of theatrical affairs

timeLine.text: Born December 20, 1940 in a family of employees in the city of Anadyr, Chukotka Autonomous Region
Graduated from a technical school in Minsk
Graduated from the Belarusian State Theater and Art Institute with a degree in Drama Theater and Cinema
Graduated from the Belarusian State Theater and Art Institute with a degree in drama director
Teacher of the Minsk house of culture of vocational education
The director of the national theater of the Belarusian Republican House of Folk Art
Worked as the second and soon the first secretary of the Frunze district committee of Komsomol in Minsk
Taught at the Gorky Minsk State Pedagogical Institute
Taught at the Minsk Institute of Culture
Director of the Belarusian Theater of Young Spectator
Invited to work at the Ministry of Culture of Belarus, where he worked as editor of the editorial board of the repertoire, and arts management
Led the Department of Theater of the Republic of Belarus Ministry of culture
Worked as a senior editor of the Concert Orchestra of Belarus.
Worked in the Yanka Kupala National Academic Theater Head literary and dramatic parts and assistant artistic director

work.text: Production of the play “Farewell to June” by A. Vampilov
Starred in the feature film “Talk Brother”
Starred in the feature film “State Border”

Barkovsky.name: Vitaly Mikhailovich Barkovsky
Barkovsky.description: Belarusian director and actor. Honored Art Worker of the Republic of Belarus

timeLine.text: Born on January 1, 1947, the village of Ostrov, Minsk region, Minsk region
Graduated from Belarusian Theater and Art Institute
Studied directing with A. Efros at the Vincent Dunin-Martsinkevich Mogilev Regional Theater in Bobruisk
Organizer and head of the theater studio «Dze-Ya?»
Organizer and head of the experimental workshops «ACT» in Minsk
Chief Director of the National Academic Theater named after J. Kolas
Artistic Director of the National Academic Theater named after J. Kolas
The main director of the Smolensk Drama Theater.

work.text: Theatrical production of «The last play of Treplev»
Theatrical production of «A play for the unborn»
Performance «The Prodigal Husband and His Wife Barbara» by G. Marchuk
Performance «I, you, he, she, it ...» by F. Schiller

Aleksandrovskaya.name: Larisa Pampeyevna Aleksandrovskaya
Aleksandrovskaya.description: Belarusian opera singer (soprano), theater director, director and public figure. People's Artist of the BSSR, People's Artist of the USSR

timeLine.text: Born February 2, 1904 in Minsk
Acted as a singer in the troupe Glavpalitprasvetu of the Western Front
A member of the amateur troupe organized by her at the political department of the Western Front
Performed Belarusian folk songs at the International Music Exhibition in Frankfurt
Graduated from the Belarusian Music College, singing class V.A. Tsvetkova
Performed the first opera part Margarita in the Faust by Charles Gounod
Graduated from the Studio of Opera and Ballet in Minsk
Artist of the Belarusian Opera and Ballet Theater
Performed opera parts at the State Opera and Ballet Theater of the BSSR
The main director of the Belarusian Opera and Ballet Theater
